sentences.sContent: Exorbitant housing prices have created an acute shortage of affordable housing for the poor.
sentences.sCn: 过高的房价使穷人负担得起的房源严重短缺。

synos.tran: （要价等）过高的；（性格等）过分的；不在法律范围之内的

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ orbit(轨道，常规) ＋ ant → 走出常规 → 过分的， 不合理的

trans.tranOther: an exorbitant price, amount of money etc is much higher than it should be
